title: Tool to improve the quality of care and life for vulnerable (Massey University)
text: ( Source : Massey University ) A new electronic assessment tool to improve the quality of care for the elderly and vulnerable could have wider applications for the health of New Zealanders . The tool, interRAI, is a relatively new concept to
